name: iknittheweb-website
description: I Knit The Web - Personal Portfolio Website

scripts.build:dev: node build.cjs development && npx sass src/scss/styles.scss dist/styles.css --style=expanded --source-map
scripts.build:prod: node build.cjs production && npx sass src/scss/styles.scss dist/styles.css --style=expanded --source-map && npx sass src/scss/styles.scss dist/styles.min.css --style=compressed --source-map
scripts.build:prod-no-maps: node build.cjs production && npx sass src/scss/styles.scss dist/styles.css --style=expanded --no-source-map && npx sass src/scss/styles.scss dist/styles.min.css --style=compressed --no-source-map
